senses.sense_definition: Relating to a vallecula, which is a groove or depression in an anatomical structure, such as the throat or brain.

examples.text: The doctor identified a benign <w>vallecular</w> cyst during the routine examination.
Swallowing difficulties can sometimes be caused by an obstruction in the <w>vallecular</w> space.

senses.sense_definition: Relating to the longitudinal channels found in the stems of certain plants, such as horsetails.

examples.text: Under the microscope, the <w>vallecular</w> canal was clearly visible in the stem cross-section.
These plants are characterized by a distinct <w>vallecular</w> structure that aids in water transport.
